posts.summary: My new painting for this coming February’s special exhibition curated by @thinkspace_art for #powwowhawaii 2016 taking place at...
posts.caption: My new painting for this coming February’s special exhibition curated by @thinkspace_art for #powwowhawaii 2016 taking place at the Honolulu Museum of Art School (@honolulumuseum). ⠀⠀⠀ ⠀ ⠀⠀⠀ ⠀ POW! WOW! Hawaii takes place February 6 to 13, 2016. Exhibition opens on Sunday, February 7th with a reception from 6-10PM.  ⠀⠀⠀ ⠀
